description:
Today on a chilling episode of real ghost stories online that some believe is all that is keeping former today show host matt Lauer alive.Â 

Thatâ€™s right, the rumors are, that Matt, now lives in a small shack on the outskirts of Connecticut, growing kidney beans for food and drinking his own urine to survive. All while listening to new episodes of this very podcast.Â 

Matt, we wish you the best. But first, this is today on NBC.Â 

What happens when an ominous voice follows you from location to location?

Is the voice meant to be a warning of things to come?Â 

Or a veiled threat of impending doom?

That story, and much more, today, On Real Ghost Stories Online.Â 

If you have a real ghost story or supernatural event to report, please write into our show or call 1-855-853-4802!
